text:
Near-Miss Management | Web/Software Developer | Center City Philadelphia | Full-Time, ONSITE | info@nearmissmgmt.com

Near-Miss Management seeks a creative, driven, independent-minded web developer to join our early-stage start-up to help support our existing product and implement new features. Near-Miss provides an analytics and visualization software solution to corporate clients in the chemical refining industry. Within our small team, your voice will be a valuable asset to product development.

Hone your already strong Javascript skills on our leading-edge visualization tools written using frameworks such as D3.js. Create beautiful interactive interfaces by translating our talented designersâ€™ static digital drawings into code using HTML, CSS (LESS), jQuery and vanilla Javascript. Create services and consume them in our full-stack Node.JS web app.

https://careers.stackoverflow.com/jobs/98537/web-software-de...
